This page shows plotly plots for the NY NOAA dataset.

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
```



```{r}
weather_df =
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(c("USW00094728", "USC00519397", "USS0023B17S"),
                      var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX", "snow"), 
                      date_min = "2017-01-01",
                      date_max = "2017-12-31") %>%
  mutate(
    name = recode(id, USW00094728 = "Central Park, NY", 
                      USC00519397 = "Waikiki, HI",
                      USS0023B17S = "Waterhole, WA"),
    prcp = prcp / 10,
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) %>%
  select(name, id, everything()) 
```

```{r boxplot}
a = list(
  title = "Maximum Temperature (ºC)"
)

weather_df %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~tmax, type = "box",
          alpha = 0.5,
          color = ~name) %>% 
    layout(
      title = "Boxplot of Maximum Temperature at 3 Weather Stations",
      yaxis = a
    )
```

```{r scatter}
x = list(
  title = "Date"
)

y = list(
  title = "Minimum Temperature (ºC)"
)

weather_df %>% 
    mutate(text_label = str_c("Precipitation: ", prcp, "\nLocation: ", name)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~date, y = ~tmin, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5,
          color = ~name,
          text = ~text_label) %>% 
  layout(
    title = "Minimum Temperature Across 3 Weather Stations in 2017",
    xaxis = x, yaxis = y
  )
```
```{r ny_trend}
x = list(
  title = "Date"
)

y = list(
  title = "Minimum Temperature (ºC)"
)

  weather_df %>% 
  filter( name == "Central Park, NY") %>% 
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Precipitation: ", prcp, "\nSnow fall: ", snow)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~date, y = ~tmin, type = "scatter", mode = "connectgaps",
          alpha = 0.5,
          text = ~text_label) %>% 
  layout(
    title = "Central Park Minimum Temperature Trends in 2017",
    xaxis = x, yaxis = y)

```
